result.execSummary:
The defendant Todd C Measner was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Must report to Probation no later than 4:30 p.m. on 9/12/2016.
Must follow rules of Probation.

miscConds.notes: $265.60 fine/cost to be paid to the Clerk of Court's office.  Bond to be applied with any remaining balance due within 60 days or set up payment plan.  Failure to pay may result in a civil judgment.

$200.00 DNA surcharge to be paid to the Clerk of Court's office.  
$100.00 Domestic Abuse surcharge to be paid to the Clerk of Court's Office.  
Bond to be applied with any remaining balance due within 60 days or set up payment plan.  Failure to pay may result in a civil judgment.
May not possess or use firearms.
No ABUSIVE contact with Melissa Mathieu.

records.addlTxt: CASES: 16CM93 & 16CM262.  Defendant Todd C Measner in court.  James Jay Rennicke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 4:02 pm.  Elissa Moring-Probation appears.  Probation-Request 1 yr extension or until DV programming has been completed.  CT-extension granted for add'l year or until programming is completed as to both cases.  4:10 pm adj.

CASES: 16CM262, 16CM93 & 16TR482. Defendant Todd C Measner in court with attorney Kate Mary Murtaugh.  Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 11:16 am.

16CM262-Exh 2 O&R.  Count 2-Def-NC plea.  CT-accept plea, adj guilty & judgment entered. 
16CM93-Exh 1 O&R.  Count 1-AMENDED to State D/C, domestic.  Amended Complaint to be filed.  Def-NC plea.  CT-accept plea, adj guilty & judgment entered.  No firearms.  
All other counts dismissed.  16TR482-dismissed.

SENTENCE:  On ea w/h sentence, probation up to 1 yr.  No abusive contact w/ Ms Matheau sp??  $265.60 on each.  DNA sample & surcharge of $200 on each.  $100 dom abuse assmt on ea file.  No firearms.  Follow rules of probation.  Bond to be applied, 60 dtp or set pp, ftp-judgment.  Payable thru COCC office.  Must report to probation no later than 4:30 on 9/12.
Restitution is set at zero.  
1 day credit if revoked in 16CM262.
ADA-potential charges in 16PL885, 16PL475 will not be filed.  11:43 am adj.
